summary: Spanning over 31 cells a road going into Winstad Manor, plus 14 unique NPC\'s, 7 of which are followers/spouse potential
descriptionHtml:
IT IS VERY IMPORTANT TO FOLLOW THE INSTRUCTIONS FOR INSTALLATION !!! 

This mod changes the landscape from Solitude to Windstad Manor 

Road installed thru 31 Cells (from Winstad Manor to Solitude 

Retextured 31 Cells to match the surrounds with what i was adding 
Over 500 plants,trees. rocks, shrubs and thicket ect. 

Re-navmeshed all 31 cells , adding preffered pathing 

A Black Smith next door to you at Winstad Manor 

Reshaped the land thru the 31 Cells 

Over 100 new idle markers and many things not mentioned 

14 New NPC\'s (All with individual AI packages/patrols 

Mason-Blacksmith 

Adele- Masons Wife 

Bethany-Mason\'s Adeles daughter 

Carina-Nord Vampire, Marriage/Follower can be found sleeping in the basement coffin of Winstad Manor during the day, is patroling/hunting the bridge over the swamp at night 

Amabel- Redguard Marriage/follower, Patrols from Silverblood Inn to Fours Shields Inn, to Winking Skeever, and finally to Winstad Manor (Working at each place, eating sleeping ect.) 

Sybrina-Darkelf,Marriage/Follower Lives at the Winstad Mannor, tends to the hatchery during the day. sandboxes the Manor at night. 

Odebia-HighElf-Winstad Guard, patrols the road from the Manor to Solitude 

Eugene-Argonian-Winstad Guard, patrols the road from the Manor to Solitude 

Arthur-Orc-Winstad Guard, patrols the road from the Manor to Solitude 

Josia-Reguard-Winstad Guard, patrols the road from the Manor to Solitude 

Aldous-RedGuard,Marriage/Follower, Riding his horse "War" on the roads between Whiterun and Riverwood 

Aquilla-Khajiit, Marriage/follower, Sleeps at Candlehearth Inn, patrols Windhelm during the day 

Lucien-Breton-Marriage/Follower, sleeps at the Winking Skeever, patrols the solitude docks during the day 

Azuba-Orc-Marriage/Follower-The biggest patrol of them all, she goes from the Winking Skeever, to Dawnstar, Whiterun, Windhelm, and stops in from time to time to the Winstad Manor for a visit, she like all the others not only patrol to the destination, they also interact at each destination 


iNSTALLATION iNSTRUCTIONS (VERY IMPORTANT); 
you will need, ApachiiSkyHair from Nexus: 
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/10168/? 
( I Emailed Apachi about a month ago to get permission to use ApachiiSkyHair mod, and got the approval for it, Thank you Again Apachii, very much appreciated 

you will need the Creation Kit 

1. Start by installing ApachiiSkyHair first, using the NMM or manually, your choice : http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/10168/? 

2. Next Install this file with NMM (File for this mod)

3.  Go into game and make a save, now go talk to any of the New NPC\'s and if they have a discolored head follow the next steps, if the coloration is fine then you are done. ( I hand packed the Face Gen Files into the Mod but its a bug With the CK and Skyrim that sometimes it does load them thats why i include the next steps, to fix the black face bug) 

4. Exit game and start up your Creation Kit 

5. Now you need to choose which files to check, Double click Skyrim.Esm, HearthFires.Esm, ApachiiHair.esm, then double click 1WinstadExt.esp, then click Set as Active File. click OK 

6. the Creation Kit takes a bit to load so give it time to fully load the files 

7. Once loaded, in the Object Window you will see Actors;, click the + sign the left of Actors, it will open up the drop down menu, Highlight the word Actor, this will give you the list of all the actors in the game, at the top of that list will be 15 names: 
1Adele 
1Aldous 
1AldousHorse 
1Amabel 
1Arthur 
1Azuba 
1Bethany 
1Carina 
1Eugene 
1Josia 
1Lucien 
1Mason 
1Odebia 
1Sybrina 

8. Highlight all of those names, the click Ctrl+F4, and box will pop up that says Export face gen data for all selected NPC,s? --Click yes , the when it says done, click ok, save and exit and your ready to play 

A Few extra notes, again i made this mod for my game, i WILL NOT make a version for vanilla skyrim, i WILL NOT make changes, if there is a legit problem i will fix it but we have been testing it for 3 days now with no issues. 


For those of you who have a legitimate question or need help i am more then willing to answer your questions or help if help is needed 


Thank you again Apachii, ApachiSkyHair is one of those mods thats a game changer, and thank you for letting me use it
author: CadenBlack
